title: New: TRACE – Honey
body:
LA’s **TRACE** follows up last years Heavy Shoulders with the alluring _Honey_.

Drawing from the likes of Lykke Li and James Blake, it’s a searingly honest, deeply emotive number; undoubtedly destined to score a huge sync at some stage. Check it below.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
